reviewText: My son is almost 2 1/2 yrs old and barely speaks so we bought this english one, we had your baby can read program but he wasn't all that crazy about it. He is talking more and he loves little pim panda. great for any language!!!

If you search on YouTube for "LittlePimCo" or "Little Pim - ENGLISH - Eating and Drinking" you can see a clip from this volume. I purchased this as a gift for a friend's adopted daughter. As an adult, I don't think I could sit through this for very long without wanting to bang my head against a wall. However, the two-year-old found it knee-slapping funny (literally) and had a blast. As long as the target audience enjoys it, it's worth the price.
